title: Nvidia is worth $5 trillion. Here’s what it means for the market
description: Nvidia's historic $5 trillion valuation reshapes market dynamics, highlighting its dominance and influence in the AI-driven economy.
author: Bloomberg
content:
Nvidia Corp made history last week when it became the first company ever to have a market value of $5 trillion. But thats just one way its casting a shadow over the global economy.
